name: Rolling Heads - Hawaii Jungle Adventure
description:
Make Hawaii friends roll, jump and fly over the sunny beach of tropical island!
Endless jumping adventure - tap the screen to jump and land on next rotating orange.
Collect coins and unlock next jungle characters! There is funny piggy and chicken, there is moana and blonde princess and lot of other tropical heroes.
Compete with your friends and compete with players over the ocean!
If you are real master, unlock all eight moana friends!
